name: Simu 🫀
greetingText: I really do not miss u,bcz you are always with me in my heart ❤️‍🔥,btw
wishText: Are Ye FAGUNIYA🥀 Tu Hamar Jaan🫀 H Re Jaan🫀 Toreko Itna Chte h Itna Chte h Kitna Chahte h Ka Bataye Sina Chir Ke Dikhaye BAJRANGBALI💪 Jaisa ;)
text1: It's A Day When A Cute Angel 🎀💝 Was Born, And That's Called Your Birthday!🎂 :D
textInChatBox: Happiest birthday to you ✨! Yeee! i always pray to my lord Shiva 🐍 for your health and success🔥,you will always be my Beloved person in the universe🌍
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and always remember that GCS 🫀 bond will always be unbreakable.
